text.*:
A map of Oceania with national flags, excluding Southeast Asia and dependent territories

This is a gallery of national flags of Oceania.

Contents

  • 1 Indo-Australian Archipelago
  • 2 Australia
  • 3 Melanesia
  • 4 Micronesia
    • 4.1 Components of the Federated States of Micronesia
  • 5 Polynesia
    • 5.1 Components of French Polynesia
  • 6 United States Minor Outlying Islands of the Pacific
